concept-wr.title: Backup and Restore Facilities
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server includes tools to backup and restore system data, virtual machines, and storage resources.

conbody.draft-comment: The xref in the following paragraph was pointing to "System Backups" in the older administration guide (psa1410807758201). That topic does not seem to exist in the new guide so I added xrefs for what look like two closely related topics. Please review and confirm this is the proper reference
conbody.p: For more information, see Titanium Server Patching and Upgrading Platform Software: and .
